page.title: 14A POLICEMAN'S WORK
page.content: Policemen in Yeovil are organised into 3 shifts 10pm_6am ,6am_2pm, 2pm _10am called nights,earlies and lates.They divide the shifts as follows:- 7 Nights _ 2 Lates _ 5 Earlies _ 2 Days off _ 5 Lates _ 2 Earlies _ Long weekend. As well as the traditional{'BEAR'} work,traffic control and direction,some officers are used to supervise men and women,including Civilion helpers,traffic wardens and special constables.Much of the work includes modern equipment including Telex machines and computers.These mean that the control room is able to respond quickly to calls for help and to deploy men where they are most wanted in as short a time as possible.
